subject: [Ip-health] More info on USA for Innovation
body:
This is a multi-part message in MIME format.
--
[ Picked text/plain from multipart/alternative ]

As has been posted to this list, USA for Innovation is headed by Ken Adelman, who is a senior council for the PR firm Edelman, which represents drug companies. Below is a list of pharmaceutical companies that have hired Edelman's services. A larger list of clients, as well as other information on the PR firm is here:

http://www.odwyerpr.com/pr_firms_database/prfirm_detail.htm?prid=%7BACFF8E63-A98F-4765-9373-288B524C24FB%7D

Abbott Laboratories
AstraZeneca
Bayer
DuPont
GlaxoSmithKline
Johnson & Johnson
MedImmune
Merck
Novartis
Pfizer
PhRMA
Roche
Sanofi-Aventis
Schering Plough
Wyeth
